oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt from Margaret Chambers Oral History Interview, 2011 February 22
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Excerpt from an oral history interview with Margaret Chambers, conducted on February 22, 2011 by Susannah Gibbons as part of the Flood 2010 Digital History Project. After the flooding of her family’s home, Chambers describes the support received from Wil Stewart of North Nashville/Bordeaux Restore the Dream Center and Westminster Presbyterian Church.
The complete interview is available in the Special Collections Division.
